snippet: She laughed. She wept. She walked. She ran. For amputee Adrianne Haslet, the Boston Marathon was a grueling 10½-hour odyssey....
lead_paragraph: She laughed. She wept. She walked. She ran. For amputee Adrianne Haslet, the Boston Marathon was a grueling 10½-hour odyssey.

headline.main: Survivor's Boston Marathon: 26.2 Miles of Agonizing Ecstasy
headline.print_headline: Survivor's Boston Marathon: 26.2 Miles of Agonizing Ecstasy
